## Forms

<div class="alert alert-danger">
The forms below are Google Docs. Do not "Request edit access", instead copy them to your personal Google account:  
`File` then `Make a copy`.
</div>

If you need to have multiple people filling out the same form, follow this:

1. Make a copy of the form to your own google account, and after filling it out,
1. click `Share`, 
1. go to `General access`, 
1. choose `Anyone with the link`, and 
1. give them `Editor` privileges.
1. copy the link and share it with the relevant people.
